Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class Ogre::FactoryObj< T >

Abstract factory class.

Does nothing by itself, but derived classes can add functionality.

template<typename T>
virtual T* Ogre::FactoryObj< T >::createInstance ( const String &  name  )  [pure virtual]

Creates a new object.

Parameters:
name Name of the object to create
Returns:
An object created by the factory. The type of the object depends on the factory.

Implemented in Ogre::BillboardParticleRendererFactory, Ogre::FileSystemArchiveFactory, and Ogre::ZipArchiveFactory.

Destroys an object which was created by this factory.
